website_summaries.verdict: Strong, long-lasting cooling relief with a pleasant spearmint scent.
pros: Ideal for covering large areas of skin

product_meta.title: Perform Cooling Pain Relief Gel For Muscle Soreness, Post-Workout Aches, Joint Pain, Arthritis, and Back Pain, Non-NSAID Pain Reliever for Cold Therapy, Cryotherapy Topical Analgesic, 4 oz. Tube
product_meta.description: Style:GelPerform is a topical analgesic that you rub, roll or spray into the affected area for temporary pain relief. The goal of Perform is to relieve short-term pain associated with arthritis, sore muscles and joint discomfort that often arises during a run or workout.
feature_bullets: The classic menthol gel you've come to know and love for fast acting, long lasting relief for your aches and pains
Perfect for applying on large areas or muscle groups with hands-on massage
Paraben-Free, menthol formula keeps pain relief and your well-being in mind
Roll-On Control allows for a smooth and mess-free application right where you need it
Great for general use anywhere you’ve got pain
